record.author: Stephen Morey
record.notes:
Morey, Stephen. 2005. The Tai languages of Assam: a grammar and texts. Canberra: Pacific Linguistics.
Tai Aiton is spoken up perhaps up to 2,000 speakers in Golaghat and Karbi Anglong districts, Assam, India. Data was elicited from Bidya Thoumoung of Assam by Stephen Morey.

record.annotation: to turn from side to side
to bite (as a mouse, or certain insects)
